project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.select: select ti.*, ps.project_name from tender_information ti,project_store ps where ti.del_flag = 0 and ps.del_flag = 0 and ti.project_id = ps.id

select * from tender_information where del_flag = 0 and project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
